message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I can't go that low.  $10,500 is my absolute bottom line. This is still a great deal for you, considering the value of the product. What do you say?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,250. Would you be willing to consider this price?
